name: Elegant Category Posts
author: David M. Wampamba

sections.description:
Retrieve and display posts from any category on your WordPress website.

By default, it adapts to the feel and look of your websites but you require to customize it for full adaptability, which you can do by yourself or contact me
on davidwampamba at gmail dot com, I will be happy to offer my assistance.

If you like this plugin please consider rating it, recommending your friends and donating which will help me developing it.
sections.installation:
From your dashboard

  • Visit Plugins > Add New
  • Search for Elegant Category Posts
  • Activate Elegant Category Posts from a list of plugins.

From WordPress.org

  • Download Elegant Category Posts.
  • Upload the elegant-category-posts directory to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  • Activate Elegant Category Posts from your Plugins page.

After Activation

1. Add `Elegant Category Posts` widget to any sidebar 
    a. Go to Appearance -> Widgets 
    b. Choose `Elegant Category Posts`
    c. Add it to a sidebar by dragging it to a desired sidebar or widget area.

2. Configure settings
    a. Enter the title. ( This will display at the front-end of the website )
    b. Enter CSS class and CSS ID, If you wish to style the widget further in order to adapt to the look of your website.
    c. Enter a Category slug. This determines the category from which the posts will be retrieved by the widget. If you want to retrieve from more than one category, just enter their slugs seperating them with a comma.
    d. Enter post count. This helps the widget retrieve the exact number of posts to display on your website.

Reviews

Reviewed by http://thekonsulthub.com
